title: [Health] Reprogrammed CRISPR-Cas13b suppresses SARS-CoV-2 replication and circumvents its mutational escape through mismatch tolerance

[Epidemiology] The epsilon variant of SARS-CoV-2, first detected California, carries three spike protein mutations that confer resistance to neutralizing antibodies generated by mRNA vaccines or by SARS-CoV-2 infection, according to new research in Science
